beats.text: ‘My neck hurts. It is so high. What is that fruit at the top? It doesn't look like a coconut. It looks like... a frozen bubble.I want to touch it’

Wait. I know that shape. That it is a cage! They have caught a star, here in $storyCity Little man-cub |VS| stated $hero_name pointing at a lightbulb placed over $avatar_street street. |VS| ‘They trapped the Red Flower inside a piece of ice so it cannot escape.’

beats.text: |VS| In awe $hero_name affirmed with surprise:|VS| ‘Powerful magic. Men are wizards, that is true. They own the light.’

|VS| You also try to reach the lightbulb. |VS| ‘Uh?! Do not shake the tree. I do not want that fire falling on my head. Let's move away before it wakes up’ |VS| concluded $hero_name giving long, rushed steps.
